mapper.select: select s.id as s_id, s.class_id, s.sex, s.birth, s.ring_number, s.ring_phone, s.creation_date, s.available, psm.parent_id, psm.student_id, psm.relationship, psm.approved, psm.approved_date, cls.id as cls_id, cls.school_id, cls.grade, cls.class, cls.available, cls.head_teacher_id, scl.id as scl_id, scl.name as schoolName from student s left join parent_student_map psm on s.id = psm.student_id left join class cls on cls.id = s.class_id left join school scl on scl.id =cls.school_id where psm.parent_id = #{parentId}
